• Three.js 3D racing game with MQTT multiplayer networking
  • Procedural terrain generation with noise-based height maps
  • Real-time chat, audio soundboard, and vehicle physics
  • IndexedDB for persistent user settings and game state
  • Day/night cycle, particle effects, and multiple camera modes
    class TerrainSystem { getHeight(x, z) { return noise * 20 + noise * 5 + noise * 60; } }
    class Car { updatePhysics(dt, input) { this.speed += throttle * accel * dt; this.rot.y += turnSpeed * dt; } }

Infinity Racer is a browser-based 3D racing game built with Three.js and MQTT networking. It features procedurally generated terrain, real-time multiplayer racing, and a full audio soundboard system. Players can customize their vehicles, chat with others, and race across dynamically generated landscapes with day/night cycles and physics-based vehicle handling.
